Enumeration Type Documentation

enum XFCHARDWAREIDFLAGS
 

Hardware identification flags; used by the XFcHardwareId class functions.

Enumeration values:
XFCHI_ANYID  "Any" id.
XFCHI_USERID  User ID (such as SIM card).
XFCHI_MEDIAID  Media ID (such as CF card).
XFCHI_DEVICEID  Device ID (such as IMEI code on a phone).
